headline: VICI Properties (VICI) Maintains Appeal Despite Analyst Downgrades
summary: VICI Properties Inc. (NYSE:VICI) is one of Goldman Sachs’ top REIT stock picks. On February 2, Scotiabank analysts downgraded VICI Properties Inc. (NYSE:VICI) to Sector Perform from Outperform and cut the price target from $36 to $30. The downgrade underscores the analyst’s cautious sentiment on the stock. Earlier on January 5, Cantor Fitzgerald cut the […]
